caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI`I, Respondent-Appellee, v. MARCO C. LEE,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 00-101463)
opinion.attorneys: Michael K. Tanigawa (of Char Sakamoto Ishii Lum Ching), for petitioner-appellant, on the writ
opinion.panel:
MOON, C.J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Ramil, and Acoba, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER DENYING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI
Petitioner-appellant Marco C. Lee's application for writ of certiorari, filed October 21, 2002, is denied.
